name: Niteman
description:
Someone planted a bomb on the new hotel, and you have 20 seconds to find it, or else...

It has two possible endings!

Every replay is different!

Controls
  • To move: WASD or the Arrow Keys.
  • Use the elevators with WS or up and down
CREDITS
  • Background music from PlayOnLoop.com
  • Sound effects from Freesound.org
